MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Reddoch Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.36am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.25pm on Monday 23rd November 2020.
